summary: Allows you to adopt drakian childrens from the mod \'\'the drakian\' doesnt require the drakian to be installed
descriptionHtml:
Drakians had so far no children in the race. Now you can adopt one and complete your dragonkin family for real (require hearthfire)

There is 4 drakian child scattered across thamriel so far

Shaarima
Skin color: purple
Type: girl
Location: Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun

Eleona
Scale color: green
Type: girl
Location: temple of the divines in Solitude

Loraniin
Scale color: green
Type: boy
Location: Temple of Talos in Windhelm

Orion
Scale color: red
Type: boy
Location: the frozen hearth in Winterhold

you do not need to have \'\'THE DRAKIANS\'\' installed to use this mode

recommanded:
My original mode The drakians wich includes the adult version of the race in the game
author: Coolster
